title: Fox News loses bid to dismiss Dominion defamation lawsuit over election coverage
description: Fox News Network on Thursday lost its attempt to dismiss a $1.6 billion lawsuit brought by Dominion Voting Systems.

title: Promising new AI can detect early signs of lung cancer that doctors can't see
description: Researchers in Boston are on the verge of what they say is a major advancement in lung cancer screening: Artificial intelligence that can detect early signs of the disease years before doctors would find it on a CT scan.

title: Leaked U.S. assessment includes warning about Russian hackers accessing sensitive infrastructure
description: A leaked U.S. intelligence assessment includes a stark reminder of the threat that hackers can pose to critical infrastructure.

title: Former Trump adviser Stephen Miller spends six hours at federal court where Jan. 6 grand jury meets
description: Former Trump adviser Stephen Miller spent six hours at the D.C. court where the grand jury tied to special counsel Jack Smith's Jan. 6 investigation meets.

title: Manhattan DA sues Rep. Jim Jordan to block GOP inquiry into Trump case
description: Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg filed a lawsuit on Tuesday against Rep.

title: China releases rules for generative AI like ChatGPT after Alibaba, Baidu launch services
description: Chinese regulators on Tuesday released draft rules designed to manage how companies develop generative artificial intelligence products like ChatGPT.

title: How redistricting brought Tennessee to this moment
description: Politics watchers note that GOP efforts in Tennessee to minimize representation of Democrats — on the federal and state levels — has been years in the making.

title: Louisville shooter legally purchased gun less than a week before massacre
description: A "suicidal" gunman legally purchased the high-powered rifle, used to kill five co-workers at a Louisville bank, less than a week before the carnage unfolded, officials said Tuesday.

title: Food storage brand Tupperware warns it could go out of business
description: Legendary food storage brand Tupperware has hired advisers to help turn around the company after notifying securities regulators it may have to close up shop.

title: Ukraine agents pursued attacks inside Belarus and Russia, leaked U.S. docs say
description: Ukrainian agents have pursued military attacks inside Belarus and Russia, which is contrary to U.S. and Western wishes, according to leaked U.S. documents.

title: 'Stranger Things' star Millie Bobby Brown and Jake Bongiovi appear to announce engagement
description: "Stranger Things" star Millie Bobby Brown and actor Jake Bongiovi, the son of rock legend Jon Bon Jovi, appeared to announce their engagement on Tuesday.

title: Democrats choose Chicago as the site of the 2024 convention
description: The Democratic Party has chosen Chicago as the site of its 2024 convention.

title: Congressional 'Gang of 8' gains access to Trump, Biden and Pence documents
description: The "Gang of Eight" has begun receiving access to classified documents found in former President Trump's, Biden's and former Vice President Mike Pence's possession.

title: YouTubers square off in the boxing ring for Creator Clash 2
description: Creator Clash aims to be different by deemphasizing online drama and big payouts.

title: Judges block Tennessee move to cut Nashville council in half
description: The Democratic-leaning city of Nashville’s Metropolitan Council will keep all 40 of its seats for now, under a temporary decision issued by three state judges.

title: FBI warns against using public phone charging stations
description: The FBI is warning people to avoid using free public phone charging stations found in airports, hotels, and shopping malls due to a risk of hackers infecting your device with malware.

title: Will Trump attend his civil rape trial? Judge wants to know
description: A judge wants to know if ex-President Donald Trump will attend a trial resulting from E. Jean Carroll's claims he raped her in a department store in the 1990s.

title: Cancer drug shortages are creating dire circumstances for some patients
description: FDA says there are shortages of four cancer drugs — Pluvicto, methotrexate, cisplatin and fluorouracil — forcing patients and doctors to make difficult decisions.

title: A.I. uses old recordings to transform audiobooks
description: Edward Herrmann was a popular actor seen on “Gilmore Girls” and “Nixon,” now he is lending his voice to new audiobooks, even after his death nine years ago. NBC’s Steven Romo has more on how A.I. is behind this new audio narration technology.

title: Louisville gunman livestreamed deadly attack on downtown bank, police say
description: LOUISVILLE, Ky. — The Kentucky shooter who opened fire Monday at a downtown Louisville bank, killing five people and injuring eight others, livestreamed the attack, police said.

title: Judge's abortion pill decision embraces extreme language and ideology of anti-abortion movement, experts say
description: Judge Kacsmaryk’s decision to pause the FDA's approval of the abortion pill mifepristone reads as ideological and extreme, according to legal and medical experts.
